name: Freshly fried shrimps seemed hot additionally named noth

description:
12 levels of player's experience
More than 50 special moves and spells
More than 30 enemies.
More than 15 items among potions, weapons and typically armors.
13 Steam Achievements

A promotional movie was made with Cyberlink powerdirector 15 ultra,
the game is not including additional powerdirector's visual effects.
